column31: If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2025 season = $3 in 2026 from JP
If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2026 season = $3 in 2027 from JP
If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2025 = 2026 2nd round pick to JP
If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2028 = 2029 2nd round pick to JP
If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2031 = 2032 2nd round pick to JP
If the Cleveland Browns do not win a Super Bowl by 2034 = 2035 2nd round pick to JP
If Kevin beats Piper in 2025 standings = 2026 1st round pick to Piper
If Kevin beats Piper in 2025 standings = 2026 1st round pick from Piper
If Piper beats Kevin in 2025 standings & Kevin beats Piper in 2027 standings = 2028 1st from Piper
If Kevin beats Piper in 2025 standings & Piper beats Kevin in 2027 standings = 2028 1st to Piper
If Kevin beats Piper in both 2025 & 2027 standings = 2029 2nd round pick from Piper
